title: Mark Cavendish: ‘I Know There Are Riders with COVID in the Tour de France Peloton’
content:
Manxman’s leadout ace Michael Mørkøv exits Tour de France with the virus, Bilbao out with unspecified illness.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish: ‘I Know There Are Riders with COVID in the Tour de France Peloton’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
